apple_vendor_description: This emoji on Apple devices features two individuals, a man and a woman, sharing a tender kiss, with both rendered in distinct medium-dark and dark skin tones.  Apple’s signature glossy 3D shading and realistic lighting create a sense of depth and warmth, highlighting the gentle curve of their faces and pursed lips.  It’s a vibrant expression of romance and intimacy, particularly when used to represent relationships between people of different complexions on Apple devices.
